message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
